name: Rangoli
description: Celebrate tradition with our exquisite Rangoli designs. Using vibrant colors and intricate patterns, our artists create stunning floor art for festivals, weddings, and special events.

processSteps.title: Site Assessment
processSteps.description: We visit your location to assess the space, lighting, and surface. This helps us recommend the perfect size, design, and color palette that will have the most impact.

processSteps.title: Live Art Creation
processSteps.description: Our artists arrive on the day of the event to create the Rangoli live. Using colored powders, flower petals, or rice, they skillfully craft the design on-site for guests to admire.

processSteps.title: Event Enhancement
processSteps.description: The finished Rangoli serves as a beautiful and auspicious centerpiece for your event, welcoming guests and adding a touch of traditional elegance and vibrant color.

commitment.title: Stunning Visuals
commitment.description: We guarantee a Rangoli that is not only beautiful but also a captivating focal point for your event.

commitment.title: Stress-Free Experience
commitment.description: Our professional team handles everything from design to cleanup, allowing you to enjoy your event without worry.

commitment.title: Respect for Tradition
commitment.description: Our designs are rooted in the rich cultural heritage of Rangoli, bringing authenticity and auspiciousness to your occasion.

commitment.title: Clean & Tidy
commitment.description: We take great care to keep our workspace neat and ensure a thorough cleanup after the event, leaving your space spotless.

commitment.title: Lasting Impression
commitment.description: Our unique and vibrant Rangoli designs are crafted to be memorable, leaving a lasting impression on all your guests.

careTips.title: Choose a Protected Spot
careTips.description: Place your Rangoli in an area with low foot traffic and minimal wind to keep the design intact for longer.

careTips.title: Keep It Dry
careTips.description: Traditional Rangoli powders are sensitive to moisture. Protect the design from water, spills, and high humidity.

careTips.title: Gentle Cleanup
careTips.description: When it's time to clean up, gently sweep or vacuum the powders. Avoid mopping directly over the design to prevent smearing.

careTips.title: Capture the Moment
careTips.description: Rangoli is ephemeral art. Take plenty of photos from different angles to preserve its beauty long after the event is over.

faqs.question: How long does it take to create a Rangoli?
faqs.answer: The time required depends on the size and intricacy of the design. A medium-sized Rangoli can take anywhere from 1 to 3 hours to complete on-site.

faqs.question: How long will the Rangoli last?
faqs.answer: An indoor Rangoli in a protected area can last for the duration of your event (1-3 days). Outdoor Rangolis are more susceptible to weather and may not last as long.

faqs.question: Are the materials safe for floors and the environment?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use non-toxic, eco-friendly colored powders and natural materials like rice flour and flower petals that are safe for most surfaces and easy to clean.

faqs.question: Can you incorporate specific themes or logos?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We specialize in custom designs and can incorporate wedding motifs, company logos, or any specific theme into the Rangoli to personalize it for your event.

faqs.question: What happens to the materials after the event?
faqs.answer: We handle the cleanup process. The materials are carefully swept up and disposed of in an environmentally friendly manner.
